DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective of this pilot project is to test in 50 women with a history of gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM), the effectiveness and feasibility of an 8 month intensive lifestyle intervention to reduce the rate of metabolic abnormalities within 1 year after delivery.
DOC.detailed_description: The objective is in comparison to a group of women not enrolled in the lifestyle intervention, 8 months of intensive lifestyle intervention aimed at promoting 7% weight loss through increased physical activity and dietary modification in women with a history of GDM will: 1. decrease body weight and 2. reduce the rate of metabolic abnormalities, 12 months after delivery
